TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Import extends System.Object

summary.span: Stellt ein einzelnes [Import](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9)-Element in einem MSBuild-Projekt dar.

span.span: Represents a single [Import](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9) element in an MSBuild project.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Condition { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Gets the Condition attribute value of the [Import](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9) element.
The Condition attribute value of the Import element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedProjectPath As String
public: property System::String ^ EvaluatedProjectPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Ruft den vollqualifizierten Pfad der Datei ab, der im Name-Attribut des [Import](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9)-Elements angegeben ist.

span.span: Gets the fully qualified path of the file specified in the Name attribute of the [Import](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9) element.

value.span: Der vollqualifizierte Pfad der Datei im angegebenen der Namen Attribut von der Import Element.

span.span: The fullly qualified path of the file specified in the Name attribute of the Import element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsImported As Boolean
public: property bool IsImported { bool get(); };

summary.span: Ruft einen Wert ab, der angibt, ob das [Import](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9)-Element in das Projekt importiert wurde.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the [Import](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9) element was imported into the project.

value.span: Wenn die Import Element wurde in das Projekt importiert wurde, andernfalls .

span.span: if the Import element was imported into the project; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProjectPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Ruft den Project-Attributwert des [Import](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9)-Elements ab oder legt ihn fest.
